title: Did You Guys See a Fairy!?
synopsis: Five high school students are whisked away by a mysterious fairy and a car-maniac scientist to become the Turboranger when the Boma begin to revive from their 20,000 years sealed away.

title: Bouma Castle! The 20,000-Year Curse
synopsis: The Turboranger must come to the aid of Saint Beast Lakia in order to help it prevent the Boma from breaking his seal to prevent the revival of their leader, Lagorn, in the modern world.

title: The Rumbling Human Dango!
synopsis: The Turboranger must stop a Boma Beast turning people into dango balls to feed to Lagorn, made worse when Ms. Yamaguchi and Dr. Dazai become trapped in one.

title: Escape! The Samurai Town
synopsis: Daichi helps a boy escape from citizens transformed into violent residents of the Edo era by a Boma Beast hoping to cause mass hysteria.

title: Slimy! Bouma Zombie
synopsis: When a Boma Beast uses a polluted lake as a source for an army of zombies, Haruna tries to convince a boy that its actions has a more destructive than helpful cost.

title: The Lover-Eating Bouma Beast!
synopsis: The Turboranger must save the girlfriend of a classmate who becomes eaten by Zimba's Boma Beast raised to eat loving couples.

title: Jarmin's House That Flies in the Sky
synopsis: Yohei tries to help a girl who has moved into a house cursed by a Boma Beast into bringing bad luck to all who live within it.

title: Yearning for a Demonic Flute
synopsis: Shunsuke gives encouragement to a troubled flute playing classmate as her instrument becomes possessed by a Boma Beast using her to deliver a curse.

title: The Boys' Day Doll That Calls Oni
synopsis: Yohei helps a boy try to get back his horse when it is stolen by an oni Boma Beast using it to steal jewelry and treasures.

title: Roar! Ular Highway!
synopsis: Riki tries to deliver a child's lunch from his mother while navigating a dangerous Ular-infested roadway controlled by their leader!

title: The Bouma Beast That Became a Star!
synopsis: Zulten releases a Boma Beast who is a follower of Lakia and who is tricked into believing the Turboranger are his enemy.

title: Activate the Witch's Trap!
synopsis: When a fortune telling Boma Beast aggravates the hearts of females in love, Haruna goes undercover in order to save a friend and her teacher from its attack.

title: He's Here! The Wandering Exchange Student
synopsis: A new student arrives at Musashino Academy specifically targeting the Turboranger as the Boma are likewise joined by a powerful but mysterious new ally.

title: Yamimaru! Deadly Aim
synopsis: As Riki contemplates the true identity of Wandering Boma Yamimaru, Yohei and Shunsuke steal a cannon being developed by Dr. Dazai that is not ready to be used for combat yet!

title: Fire the V-Turbo Bazooka
synopsis: When Yamimaru destroys the Turboranger's connection to the fairies as they try to complete their new cannon, they must rediscover how they gained their powers in order to fight once again.

title: The Teacher Who Became a Child
synopsis: Yohei is forced to watch over Ms.Yamaguchi after a Boma Beast transforms her back into a child.

title: 5-Minute Transformation
synopsis: After being struck by the effects of a powerful Boma Beast, Daichi has only five minutes of transformation left to defeat it or else permanently lose his powers!

title: Clash! Demon Siblings
synopsis: When Jarmin releases two brother Boma with the power to become a more powerful Boma Beast, Shunsuke becomes determined to save them when one gives up on his warrior ways.

title: Bouma Tribe Haruna
synopsis: Haruna becomes struck with amnesia and joins the Boma while trying to get an antidote to save Yohei from the poison of a Boma Beast.

title: Dosukoi Contest
synopsis: When a sumo wrestler Boma Beast torments athletes into fighting it, Daichi is forced by Ms. Yamaguchi to deal with the threat.

title: Youth Road!
synopsis: Lehda tries to take advantage of the rivalry between Riki and Yamimaru to tear both apart, even as Ms.Yamaguchi tries to prove that Hikaru is more human than her students think.

title: A Lot of Ghosts
synopsis: While traveling to Musashino's gymnastics training camp, Shunsuke and Haruna help a girl save her town from a Boma Beast turning all of its inhabitants into ghosts.

title: Dreadful! Summer Sea
synopsis: A Boma Beast from the South Seas arrives on Namegawa Island in a scheme to resurrect its entire clan, with only the Turboranger and a boy who lost his parents to it standing in its way.

title: The Fighting Puppy
synopsis: A Boma Beast changes a puppy saved by Haruna into a human in order to use it to trap Pink Turbo and turn her into a dog.

title: Riki! Desperate Situation
synopsis: After Riki becomes severely hurt from a battle with Yamimaru, he is forced to take action when the other Turboranger become captured by an unstoppable Boma Beast changing them into his own kind.

title: Girl Bouma Rin
synopsis: Yohei saves a Boma girl he believes is good even as she is forced under duress to attack the Turborangers in order to save her people.

title: Robo Combination Failure
synopsis: Zimba goes forth to destroy the Turboranger once and for all, but Yamimaru interferes with a dark new power that makes the Turboranger and even Seelon affected by its effect!

title: Hurry! New Model Robo
synopsis: While the other Turboranger work with Dr. Dazai to complete a new mecha to assist them, Daichi fights to protect the damaged Turbo Truck from the vengeance of Jarmin.

title: The End of Lehda
synopsis: As the Turboranger rush to rescue Dr. Dazai from Yamimaru, Lehda summons the guardian god of the Boma in a final attempt to finish off the team of teenagers.

title: Woman Warrior Kirika
synopsis: Riki tries to help out fellow student Sayoko Tsukikage when a strange power begins to awaken in her, all while Yamimaru suspects her as having a deep connection to the Boma.

title: The Big Demonic Mystery Bird!
synopsis: As the Turboranger try to cope with Sayoko being a Wandering Boma, Kirika and Yamimaru work to revive a legendary Boma creature to prove their power to Lagorn.

title: Steal! Y≈çhei's Face
synopsis: A Boma Beast switches an ugly Musashino student's face with Yohei's, who decides to use it in order to have better luck with girls.

title: Zulten's Sneaky Trick
synopsis: Yamimaru summons a Boma Beast specifically to use a humiliating ability of Zulten's, forcing Riki into helping out the Boma general.

title: The Majin Sword That Calls Love
synopsis: Daichi becomes handcuffed to a female thief who has stolen a gem Kirika desires to find a supremely powerful sword.

title: Memories of Destiny...
synopsis: A Boma Beast steals Shunsuke's memory on the tenth anniversary of the day which he had a peculiar encounter with a certain girl.

title: Mysterious Kung Fu Girl
synopsis: As the Turboranger try to deal with a mechanical clone of Zulten turning people into armored humans, Haruna comes face to face with a mysterious girl sent to pursue the team.

title: The Painting of Hell That Devours People
synopsis: Shunsuke accidentally unseals a painting Boma Beast who traps the other Turboranger within itself, forcing him to take action to save them.

title: The End of Ragorn
synopsis: The Wandering Boma trap Riki and Lagorn into facing each other in a duel to the death while they plot to crash Boma Castle into the Turboranger's base to eliminate both threats!

title: Walk! Child of Shikoku
synopsis: The Turboranger head to Shikoku when a boy who befriended Yohei becomes trapped walking non-stop due to a book created to make people suffer like the Wandering Boma.

title: The Star Is Me!
synopsis: While in Shikoku, the Turboranger are approached by a Boma Beast who appears way weaker than he should be, making Daichi believe he needs some assistance.

title: Scary Birthday!
synopsis: A Boma Beast eats Seelon on her birthday, giving the Turboranger only one hour to save her before she dies and their opponent becomes immortal from her aura!

title: The Sixth Warrior!
synopsis: A weak Musashino student steals Yohei's Turbo Brace and uses it to become a Turboranger himself to prove he can be strong.

title: Wandering Bouma Legend
synopsis: Kirika lures a comet to Earth possessing a Boma Beast that gives her the power to abandon her Wandering Boma ways and become a true Boma.

title: Super Magic Boy
synopsis: Kirika uses a Boma Beast to give a swimming student of Yohei's magic powers in order to cause chaos throughout society.

title: Ragorn's Counterattack
synopsis: Haruna enters into the land of the fairies in hopes of finding a stone to end the battle between the Turborangers and Wandering Boma, unknowing that both sides are being manipulated by a familiar enemy.

title: SOS Transformation Failure
synopsis: When the Turboranger are forced to continue to fight Neo-Lagorn's forces without their powers, Seelon decides to intervene in order to help them accomplish their goal.

title: The Wandering Bouma's Secret
synopsis: The mysterious Kashimu reveals the shocking truth about who the Wandering Boma are even as Yamimaru and Kirika desperately try to regain their powers to continue their prideful fight.

title: Beautiful Kirika
synopsis: The Turboranger try to get through to Kirika what she really stands for as a Wandering Boma even against Yamimaru's dissent and the start of Neo-Lagorn's final scheme for Earth's destruction.

title: The Dreadful Great Seal
synopsis: Neo-Lagorn prepares for the opening of the Great Seal to release the full force of the Boma, while Riki and Kirika confront Yamimaru in hopes of finally getting through to ending his deep, long hatred.

title: Graduation of Youth
synopsis: With the final opening of the Great Seal at hand, the Turborangers storm Boma Castle to face Neo-Lagorn and bring an end to the Boma threat while the fate of a tortured soul is finally determined.

title: New Show: Speeding Squadron Turboranger!
synopsis: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

title: The 10 Great Sentai Gathering! Counting On You! Turboranger
synopsis: When the Hundred Boma Tribes begins an assault on Earth, the Turboranger face off with them with the support of their ten previous Sentai allies!

title: Kousoku Sentai Turboranger: The Movie
synopsis: The Turborangers must prevent a Boma from unsealing his father in order to utilize his hellfire to burn the Earth.
